roles.description: Account owner has full privileges to access and manage a Zoom account.
roles.name: Owner

roles.description: Admins have wide range privileges to access and manage a Zoom account.
roles.name: Admin

roles.description: Members have access to basic Zoom video meeting functions but no account management privileges.
roles.name: Member

roles.description: A person with this role can view and manage groups.
roles.name: Group Administrator
